content:
```xml
<repairs>
    DEL_EDGE | (rm) | -
</repairs>
```

This repair operation removes the relationship between the patient "Samatha845" and the medication "Coumadin 5 MG Oral Tablet," as it contains an ingredient "warfarin" to which Samatha is allergic. This ensures that Samatha is not treated with a medicine containing an allergen.
